d2-a0-01
rorgD2VLD Telegram
func00Room Control Panel (RCP)
type01RCP with Temperature Measurement and Display (BI-DIR)
submitted by Fr. Sauter AG


Note: EEP Release 2.1, 2.5, and 2.6 reflected a wrong byte-order for all messages of this EEP!
Example Message Type A:
Instead of DB_1 = 0x01 DB_0 = 0x81 (which is correct for KP=1 and CV=1)
by mistake DB_1 = 0x81 DB_0 = 0x11 (which is wrong) was printed.
We apologize for the mistake.

Data 5 3 1

offsetsizeBit mask
unused
05
MsgId
53

Enum

1Message Id
ConfigValid
81

Enum

0x00Configuration data not valid (e.g. never received message of type E)
0x01Configuration data valid
unused
92
User Action
115

Enum

0x00not used
0x01Presence
0x02Temperature Set Point “down” or “—“
0x03not used
0x04not used
0x05Temperature Set Point “up” or “+”
0x06Fan
0x07 - 0x1FNot Used

offsetsizeBit mask

Enum

0x00Do not display

0x08Time 00:00 to 23:59 [24h]
0x09Time 00:00 to 11:59 [AM]
0x0ATime 00:00 to 11:59 [PM]
0x0BDate 01.01 to 31.12 [DD.MM]
0x0CDate 01.01 to 12.31 [MM.DD]
0x0DIllumination (linear) 0 to 9999
0x0EPercentage 0 to 100
0x0FParts per Million 0 to 9999
0x10Relative Humidity 0 to 100
0x11 - 0x1Fnot used
